parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield bonding can cause the windshield to detach from the vehicle, leading to water leaks, noise, and vibrations, which can compromise the structural integrity of the vehicle and pose a safety risk to the occupants.
symptoms: The windshield is loose or detached from the vehicle
the windshield moves when pressed from the inside
the windshield pops out briefly when the door is closed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield seal bond can cause the windshield to detach from the body, leading to poor visibility and increased risk of injury or death in the event of a collision.
symptoms: detachment of the windshield from the body.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden explosion of the sunroof can cause damage to the vehicle, distraction to the driver, and increased risk of injury or accident.
symptoms: no prior indication of faults with the sunroof system
sunroof was closed at the time of the explosion.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the steering wheel to become difficult to turn or fail altogether, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The steering wheel becomes difficult to turn
the steering wheel fails to respond
the vehicle pulls to one side
the vehicle is hard to steer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vibration and premature wear of tires can cause the vehicle to shake or vibrate, leading to reduced traction and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle shakes or vibrates while driving
the vehicle pulls to one side.
